MethodDescription: Temperature data calculated from 0.5(AIR_TMAX+AIR_TMIN). AIR_TMAX and AIR_TMIN are obtained from NCDC's "GHCN (Global Historical Climatology Network) - Daily Documentation".

Maximum Temperature data are downloaded from the National Climatic Data Center Website, Daily Station Summaries for station GHCND:USC00082850: https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo-web/datasets/GHCND/stations/GHCND:USC00082850/detail. Details of the equipment history is described here: https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/homr/#ncdcstnid=10500048&tab=PHR. Details of observation methods are described in NCDC's "GHCN (Global Historical Climatology Network) - Daily Documentation".

Minimum Temperature data are downloaded from the National Climatic Data Center Website, Daily Station Summaries for station GHCND:USC00082850: https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo-web/datasets/GHCND/stations/GHCND:USC00082850/detail. Details of the equipment history is described here: https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/homr/#ncdcstnid=10500048&tab=PHR. Details of observation methods are described in NCDC's "GHCN (Global Historical Climatology Network) - Daily Documentation".

Precipitation data are downloaded from the National Climatic Data Center Website, Daily Station Summaries for station GHCND:USC00082850: https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo-web/datasets/GHCND/stations/GHCND:USC00082850/detail. Value in precipitation or snow is a 24 hour total at Time of Observation, accumulated since last measurement. Time of Observation (2 digit hour, 2 digit minute) is the 24 hour clock time of the observation given as the local time at the station of record: 0830. A Standard Rain Gage is used.  Details of the equipment history is described here: https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/homr/#ncdcstnid=10500048&tab=PHR. Details of observation methods are described in NCDC's "GHCN (Global Historical Climatology Network) - Daily Documentation"
